comments: p(1),p(2),p(3)... are the prime numbers (A000040). The analogous sequence for the partition numbers is A048574.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)a023626 n = a023626_list !! (n-2)a023626_list = f a000040_list [1] where   f (p:ps) rs = (sum $ zipWith (*) rs a008578_list) : f ps (p : rs)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 09 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
